full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I BLA MA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DI NI RTA MGRIN DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I BSKANG GSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BYA BA NI, DBANG RJE'I NANG LUNG SOGS YOD NA STON ZHUS 'BYUNG, MED NA MA 'BYUNG YOD DO, ,BKA' 'GYUR BA NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBUS MDZAD DGE SLONG BSTAN PA BKRA SHIS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
